name: Snow Day (Aaaac)
description:
It snowed last night and school is no doubt cancelled. What does an eight year old do? Spend his snow day with his best friend!

"Snow Day" is a short minimalist transformation HTML CYOA game. I made it to enter a contest on the TFGS. 

It is entirely G-rated and features a male to female transformation.

Home page: https://tfgames.site/index.php?module=viewgame&id=1590
This is a download mirror basically.

Length: 17,413 words

Version:  1.01
